wikipedia_page.main: Jonathan William Panzo (born 25 October 2000) is an English professional footballer who plays as a defender for Ligue 2 club Dijon.

link_mentions.page: List of foreign Ligue 1 players: E

response: On 6 July, Monaco announced the signing of Jonathan Panzo from Chelsea, and Pelé on a five-year contract from Rio Ave.

link_mentions.page: List of Belgian football transfers summer 2019
response: | 30 August 2019 ||  Jonathan Panzo ||  Monaco || Cercle Brugge || Loan

On 30 August, Jonathan Panzo and Lyle Foster both moved on season-long loan deals to Cercle Brugge. The following day, AS Monaco announced the signing of Tiémoué Bakayoko on a season-long loan deal with an option to purchase outright, and that Adama Traoré had joined Metz on a season-long loan deal.
